$entity: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, location_id, tags FROM app_human_0 WHERE id = :id

location.$entity: SELECT entity.id, entity.name, entity.lat, entity.long FROM app_location_0 entity WHERE entity.id = :id

categories.$collection: SELECT entity.id, entity.name FROM app_human_0_category rel INNER JOIN app_category_0 entity ON entity.id = rel.category_id WHERE rel.human_id = :id ORDER BY entity.id DESC LIMIT 16

map.$collection: SELECT rel.name AS hash_key, entity.id, entity.name, entity.lat, entity.long FROM app_human_0_location rel INNER JOIN app_location_0 entity ON entity.id = rel.location_id WHERE rel.human_id = :id ORDER BY entity.id DESC LIMIT 16
